Name: Super Life: Franchise Lord
About the game: Super Life Franchise Lord is an incremental franchise management sim set in the world of Super Life RPG with an idle game progression system. Disclaimer: This game was designed for mobile devices and is best experienced on Android or iOS 1. Little Zeus 2. Slimmy Sam's 3. Taco Box 4. Angus McBangus Not actual gameplay. Start small and grow by upgrading equipment and researching new menu items to increase profitability! Complete customer orders yourself or hire employees and make them do all the work. They will still look to you to deal with customer complaints and handle workplace accidents. Purchase employee perks to hire better employees, increase employee levels to allow you to run your franchises more hands off. Raise animals for slaughter at the farm, or buy fresh ingredients from vendors at the farmers market! Buy (or steal) AmaZone boxes to collect items that help keep your franchises running smoothly or sway conversations in your favor. The Money Tree is back and serves as one of multiple daily reward systems in the game. You can also collect free coins from your coin miner and complete daily tasks for additional rewards!
